MAIN_MESSAGE: This is a message for customers in the TD8 postcode area of Kelso & Jedburgh. It has been necessary for our engineers to carry out an emergency shutdown at 08:23am following reports of a grounded overhead line near Buchtrig Farm and this may affect the supply to your property. We will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 10:30am. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 08:25am on te 8th of January 2021.
